title: ChatGPT-Utilized Chemistry Education Design Workshop for Pre-Service Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: AI-based educational design practice and project-based assessment operation utilizing personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Extend scientific and pedagogical content by three or more levels when designing elementary chemistry education activities using ChatGPT
Generate chemistry education design questions that reflect students' misconceptions
Develop the ability to critically analyze generative AI responses and restructure them for educational contexts
Systematically organize ChatGPT utilization records into a portfolio within science education activity design

resources: Elementary Science Textbooks and Curriculum Documents

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
